title: munde bhalA
sahitya:
munde bhalA endu hindADi kombara sanga bEDa kundu nindegaLapavAda nIDuvara prasanga bEDa


caraNam 1    tudi nAlige bella ede kattariyavara sanga bEDa hadavu mIrida mEle halavanADuvara sanga bEDa
    caraNam 2    svIyAva guNa biTTu pararava guNa tOrpara sanga bEDa daye dharma dAkSiNya ariyada manujara sanga bEDa
    caraNam 3    vinaya vivEkavillada vidavAmsara sanga bEDa tanagilladantha baNTara mitra janara sanga bEDa
    caraNam 4    Adi Alukuva ajnAni manujana sanga bEDa kUDe kumatigaLa kupita manujara sanga bEDa
    caraNam 5    tanna kAryakkAgi parara keDisuvara sanga bEDa cenna purandara viTTalanna horatu prasanga bEDa
